body.name: Paula's Choice RESIST Barrier Repair Advanced Moisturizer with Ceramides, Peptides, Deep Hydration Cream for Wrinkles, Anti-Aging for All Skin Types, Fragrance-Free & Paraben-Free, 1.7 Fl Oz
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 9 hrs 10 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 18 hrs 25 mins
features: SKIN-IDENTICAL CERAMIDES: Nourishing ceramides & cholesterol replenish skin’s barrier, prevent water loss & deliver long-lasting moisture.
TRIPEPTIDE-5 & WATERMELON SEED OIL: Clinically proven to visibly reduce wrinkles & signs of aging; helps protect collagen levels for firmer-looking skin & aids in ceramide formation.
ALL-DAY HYDRATION: Improves hydration in 30 minutes & prevents moisture loss with a lightweight texture.
SAFE FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: Creamy, daily lotion with a hydrating finish that won’t weigh you down and is suitable for all skin types.
Paula's Choice Skincare makes science-backed products that work. No fragrance, no fluff. Just effective, cruelty-free formulas that target any concern from wrinkles to breakouts.

How do I know if this product is authentic? To ensure the authenticity, please make sure you’re purchasing from Paula’s Choice Skincare. The authenticity of any product cannot be guaranteed when purchased from sellers other than Paula’s Choice Skincare. Can you use the RESIST Barrier Repair Advanced Moisturizer with vitamin C? Yes, you can use this with vitamin C. Research indicates that vitamin C works well with other beneficial anti-aging ingredients including niacinamide, retinol, peptides (except copper peptides, which Paula’s Choice does not use) & exfoliating acids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I saw this product on Tik Tok where a dermatologist was recommending it as his number 1 pick of moisturizers for aging skin. Since I fall into that demographic, I decided to try it and am SO glad I did. My face has been so dry for the past few months due to the change of seasons. I noticed significant results within two days of using this product. I've been using it for a month now and my skin looks amazing - I've gotten numerous compliments about how good it looks.Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use tretinoin which has just messed up my skin barrier. This has 💯 repaired it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Can't go wrong with Paula's
reviews.reviewText: Excellent all purpose facial moisturizing cream suitable for all skin types (normal, dry oily, combo). This is a pale white cream, fragrance free and just a few small dabs will suffice to cover the facial surface. The product comes in a rounded plastic pump dispenser and comes with 1.7 ounces of lotion. Formulation is built around ceramides, peptides and watermelon seed oil to nourish and replenish the skin barrier along with moisturization and wrinkle reduction benefits. The cream quickly absorbs into the skin and leaves a natural and nourished appearance with no sheen. Effective for both day and night usage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A nice light moisturizer that soaks in quickly
reviews.reviewText: While I've never personally tried any products from Paula's Choice, I have heard good things. So, I decided to try this RESIST Barrier Repair Advanced Moisturizer and see if it would help moisturize my dry/combination skin. So far I've been pretty impressed. This moisturizer is quite light and has a good texture. It soaks into my skin quickly and so far hasn't left any residue or greasy film as some moisturizers do. The moisturizer does have a light sort of lotion-y smell, but it's not overpowering at all. Overall, I'm pretty pleased with this moisturizer and would definitely consider picking it up again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for me…. But still nice
reviews.reviewText: I’m kind of sad this product didn’t work for me, but my skin is super sensitive and doesn’t like change very much. It does have a nice, thick texture, and it’s not scented which is always good. I do have acne prone skin with eczema around my chin area. This is honestly the hardest part to not be so dry. Thought I’d give this product a try and well, it just didn’t work for me. I do like Paula’s Choice though, and think this would still be a great option for people who may not have super dry, sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth, weightless feel
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for my (almost) 40 year old skin. I have a hard time with heavy moisturizers, so i was looking for something light and I liked this PM moisturizer because it doesn't have SPF in it - something that I don't need or what in a moisturizer in the evening.I felt like one pump of this was enough to cover my face and neck and it felt light going on, and then weightless on my skin afterward. This is going to last quite a while given that one pump is all I need, so I can't even contemplate buying more right now.Hydration: I would say it's pretty hydrating for my skin, which is pretty normal with oil production. I felt like the moisturization feeling lasted, but wasn't greasy, and that's exactly what I want out of a moisturizer.The only think I don't like about it is the "unscented" scent. It smells like. . .lotion. It fades once it's on your skin but I'd honestly prefer a little scent to block out the unscented lotion chemical smell. That's likely a me thing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for dry skin
reviews.reviewText: This cream works well and doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin. I appreciate that it’s made with cleaner ingredients and is fragrance free. It’s a fair price for the product and I will buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I don’t have sensitive skin, but, this made my whole face swell. However, the upside of this is I did not have wrinkles for two days. LOL If it’s not too late, I will be returning.
